metadata.title: CVE-2018-7587 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. DoS occurs when loading a crafted bmp image that triggers an allocation failure in load_bmp in CImg.h.

notes.note: msalvatore> no patch available as of 2019-06-05

criterions.comment: cimg package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
